Todo List

Implement new paradigms of classification (neural networks, support vector machines,...).

Class Dataset
Implement a mechanism to condense the dataset by eliminating useless samples during training.

Class FeatureVector
Implement another method to compute distance between vectors (e.g. the Mahalanobis distance).

Class Preprocessor
Implement a method to correct the slope of text lines with respect to the x-axis that prevents the lines to be completely horizontal or vertical (skewness).

Member Preprocessor::applyGlobalThresholding ()
Avoid the assumption made about background's gray level. Sometimes a press clip background comes in dark gray levels and the ink in light ones. Some function should be developed to automatically make the right decision.
